member.name: MODULEINFO
member.summary: Contains the module load address, size, and entry point.

member.name: MODULEINFO.lpBaseOfDll
member.summary: The load address of the module.

member.name: MODULEINFO.SizeOfImage
member.summary: The size of the linear space that the module occupies, in bytes.

member.name: MODULEINFO.EntryPoint
member.summary: The entry point of the module.
